pages.title: Standard Fuel Rods
pages.text: $(bold)crusty_chunks:fuel_rod$() are the primary fuel source for all reactors. Crafted from enriched uranium. Load them into empty_fuel_rod blocks (4-5 per slot). When depleted, they eject from the reactor automatically.

pages.title: Loading Fuel
pages.text: To load fuel into a reactor:$(li)Collect 4-5 fuel rods in your inventory$(li)Right-click the empty_fuel_rod block with the rod in hand$(li)Repeat until the slot is full$(li)Reactor begins fission automatically once primed

pages.title: Plutonium Fuel (Endgame)
pages.text: Once you have plutonium_nuggets from a $(l:warium_integrations:nuclear/breeder_reactor)breeder reactor$(/l), you can craft ultra-high-density fuel rods. Combine plutonium_nugget + reactor_casing in a crafting grid to create plutonium-enriched fuel rods.

pages.title: Plutonium Benefits
pages.text: Plutonium rods produce $(bold)significantly more RF$() per burn cycle and last much longer than standard uranium rods. They're the ultimate fuel source. Worth the effort to set up breeder reactors.

pages.title: Fuel Chain
pages.text: $(l:warium_integrations:nuclear/uranium_enrichment)Mine & enrich uranium$(/l) -> craft fuel rods -> load into power reactor -> generate power -> feed enriched uranium to breeder -> collect plutonium -> craft plutonium rods -> maximum efficiency.
